DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesized simvastatin and pravastatin may have differential metabolic effects in hypercholesterolemic patients.
DOC.criteria: Lowdensity lipoprotein cholesterol levels > 130 Overt liver disease, Chronic renal failure Hypothyroidism Myopathy Uncontrolled diabetes Severe hypertension
DOC.keyword: simvastatin and pravastatin may have differential metabolic effects in hypercholesterolemic patients.
